description: Caimans are a species of reptile closely related to the alligator. Emblems of caiman and caiman-like creatures, like this pair of pendants, were often symbolic of the land floating in the primordial sea, thus evoking the world of the original creation and the ongoing ties between the mythic past and the heroic present.
title: Double Pendant in the Form of a Mythical Saurian with Tusks
